data.text: Jal Manyalo Duto, Nyasaye ma en Jehova Nyasaye,
Nyasaye rieny gie Sayun,
Nyasachwa biro kendo ok obi lingʼ
Oluongo joma odak e polo malo
“Choknauru joga maler,
Kendo polo hulo timne makare,
“Winjuru, yaye joga, mondo awuo kodu,
Ok akweru nikech wach misengini mutimona,
Ok agomb rwath moro amora moa e kundeu
nikech le moro amora manie bungu en mara,
Angʼeyo nying winyo ka winyo manie wi gode,
Ka dine bed ni kech kaya to ok dak anyisu,
Uparo ni achamo ring rwedhi
Chiwuru misango mar goyo erokamano ni Nyasaye,
kendo luongauru e kinde ma un e chandruok;
Joma timbegi richo to Nyasaye wachonegi ni:
Ere kaka dutim kamano to uchayo puonjna
Ka uneno jakuo to uriworu kode
Utiyo gi dhou kuom timo richo
Usiko uwuoyo marach kuom joweteu
Gigi duto usetimo ka an to alingʼ;
“Paruru matut kuom wachni, un joma wigi wil gi Nyasaye,
Ngʼat ma timona misango mar erokamano miya duongʼ
